title: Huguenot Fugitives Endeavoring Escape after Saint Bartholomew
credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Paul B. Ernst
provenance_text:
Judge Henry H. Hilton by 1879; A. F. Eno (sale, American Art Association, New York, Feb 13-16, 1900, no. 115); Grosvenor B. Clarkson, New York, NY; Mr. and Mrs. Arthur E. Braun, Pittsburgh, PA, 1925; Arthur E. Braun, Pittsburgh, PA until 1976; by descent to their daughter, Elizabeth Braun Ernst (Mrs. Paul B. Ernst), 1976; her gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, May 1978.

Under review by CGK
